content.text:
# Dwars door Gendringen

| number        = 54
| final         = 2004
| firstwinner   =
| mostwins      =
| mostrecent    =
}}
Dwars door Gendringen was a cycling race held annually in Gendringen, Netherlands. It was disbanded in 2004.
